sections.heading: 59 through 75 of this act shall be known and may be cited as the “Oklahoma Sheep and Wool Producers Act”
sections.text: Added by Laws 1973, c. 164, § 1, emerg. eff. May 16, 1973. Amended by Laws 2001, c. 146, § 59, emerg. eff. April 30, 2001. Renumbered from § 1501 of this title by Laws 2001, c. 146, § 253, emerg.
